website_summaries.verdict: Many users of the Brooks Levitate 2 were impressed with the shoe – numerous praises were made regarding the noticeable improvements, while the fit and performance of the shoe were consistently well-regarded. Although there were some criticisms about the Levitate 2’s weight and in-shoe environment, the majority still concluded that this neutral running shoe was a worthy purchase.
pros: The Brooks Levitate 2 had a fantastic fit, according to some
The shoe was very comfortable right out of the box, a reviewer claimed
A few buyers enjoyed the design of the Levitate 2
Some runners approved the addition of the Achilles protector in the Levitate 2
The midsole was responsive, and it provided great cushioning, a wearer noted
The padded tongue was well appreciated by various consumers
Many users were pleased that the shoe ran true to size
The upper gave a sock-like fit, according to a pleased buyer
The Levitate 2 was surprisingly nimble and flexible, said an impressed runner
Most of the users of the Levitate 2 claimed the shoe had a roomy toe box
The shoe helped keep the foot in proper alignment, a reviewer reported
cons: Some runners thought the Levitate 2 was a bit heavy
The foot felt quite hot inside the shoe, a user observed
Another person complained that it felt like wearing a sweater in the summer
The shoe took a long time to dry out whenever it got wet or soaked with sweat, a buyer noticed

customer_reviews.title: wore them to Great North Run
customer_reviews.text: Having regularly used Levitate for the past twelve months for long route running , I ordered a pair as soon as the price dropped on here. And without breaking them in , wore them to Great North Run. What marvellous trainers , soft , smooth , light to run in, and most comfortable. I have got some decent pairs including nike vaporfly 4%. But id pick levitate 2 anyway over the former.
customer_reviews.author: Junaid T.

customer_reviews.title: So far so excellent - and then amazing
customer_reviews.text: One week in and I’m still wearing them. Not my usual brand but thought I’d try something different and I like them. Not sure I’d buy again but still like them. Update: after over 500 miles I really started to love these shoes. But decided to try something else when it was time for a new pair, after a few hundred miles in my new pair I went back to these for one run and realised how much they suit my style of running. Just ordered another pair - after 20 years of running I can now say these are definitely my favourite.
customer_reviews.author: D Kamara

customer_reviews.title: Solid daily trainer
customer_reviews.text: -Have about 150 miles in these now -At first they did seem noticeably heavier than most modern runners, but this is compensated for by the springy sole -wouldn't recommend for anything above tempo/threshold pace -would recommend going a size down if you're on the smaller-end of your size -great cushioning: really does give your joints and tendons a rest on easy days -overall: ideal easy day shoe that I think will easily surpass 400 miles

product_meta.title: Brooks Levitate 2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Brooks Levitate 2 Running Shoes Strap in and get ready for the run of your life. Brooks is back with the most energy return running shoe in the business. The polyurethane foam encased in the thermoplastic skin delivers this exceptional ride that gives back more of the effort you put in. FitKnit Upper Using FitKnit upper, Brooks have designed the Levitate to work with you and your unique foot shape. The material will move with your every stride, providing you with both flexibility and durable versatility. The mesh that surrounds the upper is made from an extremely lightweight and breathable material. This means that as you begin to work, the warm air that will start to build up within the shoe will then be able to escape out of the shoe. Once removed, it is replaced with cooler air, which will leave you feeling fresh and ventilated. Sweat will also be removed out of the shoe, which will increase comfort. The toes are surrounded by thicker material which will prevent any bumps and knocks from causing damage. The rearfoot is also held in a firm and upright position by strong walls which will prevent it from slipping out of place and causing injury. Up the foot laces and a soft padded tongue will allow you to find a secure and comfortable fit every time. The ankle collar is also extremely soft, which will reduce the risk of discomfort and irritation from rubbing and chafing. DNA AMP Midsole Using Brooks' developed innovative DNA AMP, the foam found in the midsole will deliver long-lasting spring and bounce, helping push you further and faster. Towards the bottom of the sole, the EVA is shock absorbing and will prevent any heavy pressure from causing damage to the foot. The top half of the midsole, and in closest contact to the sole of the foot is extremely cushioned, ensuring that you will have smooth comfort in every step.
